COMMENT_TX: ej,virdb101,M,harvd901,Balls and strikes Pirates Manager Bill Virdon ejected by HP umpire Doug Harvey
$Dave Kingman struck by ground ball on the chin; knocked out
$Milt Pappas threw pitch over Jim Barr's head; both benches cleared; Dave Rader scored from 1B in the confusion; the Cubs protested the game because the umpires allowed Rader to score

ej,aguih101,C,donaa901,Intentional HBP ej,lockw101,M,donaa901,Intentional HBP ej,pappm101,P,donaa901,Intentional HBP ej,barrj101,P,donaa901,Charging mound $the next pitch hit Jim Barr on the right elbow; Barr threw his bat towards Pappas; both benches cleared; Bobby Bonds and Giants coach Joe Amalfitano restrained catcher Randy Hundley; Cubs coach Pete Reiser was carried off field after being injured in the brawl; Pappas, Barr, Cubs Coach Hank Aguirre and Cubs Manager Whitey Lockman ejected by HP umpire Augie Donatelli
$Joe Pepitone called out on appeal for missing 2B while returning to 1B
ej,mccow101,P,tatat901,Called third strike Willie McCovey ejected by HP umpire Terry Tata
$Johnny Bench caught ball over the top of the fence
$Richie Hebner lost the ball in the sun
